import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import './ItemCard.css' export const ItemCard = ( { category, id, thumbnail, title, brand, price, rating } ) =>{ const pegarLocalStorage = () => JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('produtos')) ?? [] const handleSubmit = (e) =>{ e.preventDefault() const dbClient = pegarLocalStorage() dbClient.push } return(

{category}

{title}

{brand}

R$: {price},00

Avaliação: {rating}

) }
